Comment: The Queen pawn opening is the best move for those who want to improve quickly, avoid huge amounts of theory, learn the elements of attacking play and at the same time restrict their opponents options from the start of the game...it provides a method for learning chess at a more leisurely rate and avoid being overrun with tactics from more knowledgeable opponents.
A slower method of play for white but avoids Black's favorite repertoir against Queen's Gambit and places White on hopefully more familiar ground.
